snippet.description: ... ... Thank you for using the Intestinal Gas Guide! ... You have reviewed all of our advice that is most relevant to your symptom of belching (burping). snippet.title: Intestinal Gas Guide - Intestinal Gas Guide Symptoms - Acid Reflux Symptoms
snippet.description: ... Since you reported cramps or diarrhea along with your gas, here is a follow-up question: ... Do you have either of these two experiences? ... ... ... Your cramps feel more comfortable after you pass a bowel movement. ... ... ... Your diarrhea alternates with episodes of constipation. ... ... Yes, I have experienced at least one of these patterns. No, I do not have these symptoms. ...

snippet.title: Intestinal Gas Guide - Intestinal Gas Guide Symptoms - Acid Reflux Symptoms
snippet.description: ... Some people who have gas complaints suffer primarily from belching (burping), with or without a noisy stomach. Other people are more bothered by bloating or frequent passing of gas from the rectum (flatulence). ... What is your most noticeable gas problem? ... Belching (burping) or a noisy stomach Lower abdominal gas (flatulence) or bloating ...
